steps.title: Click the ruler.
steps.content: Click the ruler. It's on the desk. This adds the ruler to your inventory. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the globe repeatedly.
steps.content: Click the globe repeatedly. Eventually, you will see pink gum on the globe. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click the gum.
steps.content: Click the gum. This adds the gum to your inventory. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Drag the gum to the ruler.
steps.content: Drag the gum to the ruler. This makes a sticky ruler. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Drag the sticky ruler to the vent.
steps.content: Drag the sticky ruler to the vent. This uses the sticky gum on the ruler to get the rubber band inside the vent. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Drag the rubber band to Mr.
steps.content: Drag the rubber band to Mr. Soggy's head. This knocks his glasses off and blinds him.

steps.title: Click the glasses.
steps.content: Click the glasses. This adds them to your inventory. You will need them shortly. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click the red arrow that says "Hallway".
steps.content: Click the red arrow that says "Hallway". This exits the room.

steps.title: Click the penny on the ground.
steps.content: Click the penny on the ground. It's on the ground in front of the first locker in the hallway.

steps.title: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Library."
steps.content: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Library."

steps.title: Drag the glasses to Mr.
steps.content: Drag the glasses to Mr. Read. He will put on the glasses and give you a bookmark. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Drag the bookmark to the sticky ruler.
steps.content: Drag the bookmark to the sticky ruler. This joins the bookmark and the ruler to make a long stick.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the door.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the door. This exits the library.

steps.title: Click the arrow pointing left at the end of the hallway.
steps.content: Click the arrow pointing left at the end of the hallway. You will navigate to the hallway to the left.

steps.title: Click the penny.
steps.content: Click the penny. It's next to the lockers to the right of the ladies room. This adds it to your inventory. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the supply closet.
steps.content: Go to the supply closet. Click the arrow pointing down on the right side to enter the supply closet.

steps.title: Drag your long ruler to the dime on the top shelf.
steps.content: Drag your long ruler to the dime on the top shelf. This knocks the dime off the shelf and adds it to your inventory.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the door.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the door. Once you are finished inside the supply closet, click the arrow in front of the door to leave.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the men's room.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the men's room. You will enter the men's room.

steps.title: Click the stall.
steps.content: Click the stall. This opens the stall and allows you to interact with everything inside.

steps.title: Click the toilet paper.
steps.content: Click the toilet paper. This adds the toilet paper to your inventory.

steps.title: Drag the toilet paper to the toilet.
steps.content: Drag the toilet paper to the toilet. This will put the entire roll in the toilet.

steps.title: Click the flusher.
steps.content: Click the flusher. This will cause the toilet to clog and the janitor will leave his closet to take care of the problem. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Hallway".
steps.content: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Hallway". When you are done in the bathroom, click the arrow to leave the bathroom.

steps.title: Click the arrow to the left.
steps.content: Click the arrow to the left. This takes you to the hallway to the left where the stairs are at.

steps.title: Click the penny.
steps.content: Click the penny. It's in front of the stairs.

steps.title: Click the arrow that points up the stairs.
steps.content: Click the arrow that points up the stairs. This takes you up the stairs.

steps.title: Click the arrow to the right to go right.
steps.content: Click the arrow to the right to go right. You will see a speech bubble coming from one of the lockers.

steps.title: Click on the locker where Richy is yelling from.
steps.content: Click on the locker where Richy is yelling from. He will tell you that the combination to the locker is in Mrs. Oddverb's room. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the janitor's closet.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the janitor's closet. While the Janitor taking care of the clogged toilet, you are free to enter the janitor's closet.

steps.title: Click the quarter.
steps.content: Click the quarter. The quarter should be under the chair. You will obtain another 25 cents.

steps.title: Click the arrow that says "Hallway".
steps.content: Click the arrow that says "Hallway".

steps.title: Go to the teacher's lounge.
steps.content: Go to the teacher's lounge. The teacher's lounge is in front of the men's room. To get to the teacher's lounge, click the arrow to the left to go left. Then click the arrow to go back downstairs. Then click the right arrow to go right.

steps.title: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Teacher's Lounge".
steps.content: Click the arrow at the bottom of the screen that says "Teacher's Lounge". The teacher will ask you where you came from. This is where you will make speech choices.

steps.title: Choose Mrs. Oddverb, about Richy.
steps.content: Choose Mrs. Oddverb, about Richy . She will ask "What about Richy?"

steps.title: Choose He's stuck in his locker. His combination is in your class.
steps.content: Choose He's stuck in his locker. His combination is in your class . She will ask if she should go to her classroom.

steps.title: Choose Yes.
steps.content: Choose Yes . She and the other teacher will leave.

steps.title: Click the middle drawer.
steps.content: Click the middle drawer. There should be three drawers. Click the middle one to look inside.

steps.title: Click the nickel.
steps.content: Click the nickel. It's in the middle drawer. Then click Back to leave the drawer.

steps.title: Go to the hallway in front of Mrs.
steps.content: Go to the hallway in front of Mrs. Oddverb's room. Click the arrow in front of the door to exit the teacher's lounge. Then click the left arrow to go left. Then click the arrow to go upstairs. Then click the right arrow to go right. Then click the right arrow to go right again.

steps.title: Click the penny to get it.
steps.content: Click the penny to get it. It's in front of Mrs. Oddverb's room.

steps.title: Click the first yellow locker.
steps.content: Click the first yellow locker. It's the one that is slightly brighter on the left. Click it to open it.

steps.title: Click the nickel.
steps.content: Click the nickel. It's in the yellow locker.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the door to Mrs.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the door to Mrs. Oddverb's room. You will enter Mrs. Oddverb's room.

steps.title: Click the paper on the desk.
steps.content: Click the paper on the desk. This is the combination to Richy's locker, but Mrs. Oddverb says it just says "BLOBBLES" [11] X Research source

steps.title: Return to Richy's locker.
steps.content: Return to Richy's locker. To get to Richy's locker, click the arrow to leave Mrs. Oddverb's room and then click the arrow to go right.

steps.title: Click Richy's locker.
steps.content: Click Richy's locker. This shows the combination lock.

steps.title: Click the "BLOBBLES" combination letter.
steps.content: Click the "BLOBBLES" combination letter. Upside down, BLOBBLES reads as 5-3-7-8-8-0-7-8. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Enter "5-3-7-8-8-0-7-8" as the combination.
steps.content: Enter "5-3-7-8-8-0-7-8" as the combination. Click the up and down arrows below each number to edit them.

steps.title: Click the unlock button.
steps.content: Click the unlock button. It's the icon that resembles a lock. Richy will exit the locker and give you a quarter as thanks. He will also tell you that he collects buttons.

steps.title: Go to Miss Count's room.
steps.content: Go to Miss Count's room. To get to Miss Count's room from Richy's locker, click the arrow to go left. Then click the arrow to go down the stairs. Then click the arrow to go left again.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of Miss Count's room.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of Miss Count's room. You will enter Miss Count's room.

steps.title: Click computer keyboard key.
steps.content: Click computer keyboard key. It's under the pile of monkey dolls in front of Miss Count's desk. The key is small a little hard to spot. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of Miss Count's door.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of Miss Count's door. This takes you back to the hallway.

steps.title: Go to Mrs.
steps.content: Go to Mrs. Flask's room. To get to Mrs. Flask's room from Miss Count's room, click the right arrow to go right, and then the arrow to go up the stairs. Once you're up, click the left arrow to go left.

steps.title: Click the penny.
steps.content: Click the penny. It's on the floor in front of the alien poster on the left.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of Mrs.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of Mrs. Flask's room. She has a weird machine on the desk.

steps.title: Drag the computer key to the machine on the counter.
steps.content: Drag the computer key to the machine on the counter. The machine will make a button.

steps.title: Click the button in the machine to collect it.
steps.content: Click the button in the machine to collect it.

steps.title: Click the arrow to exit Mrs.
steps.content: Click the arrow to exit Mrs. Flask's room. This takes you back to the hallway.

steps.title: Go to Mrs.
steps.content: Go to Mrs. Oddverb's room. Click the right arrow three times to go to the other end of the upstairs hallway.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of Mrs.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of Mrs. Oddverb's door. You'll find Richy here.

steps.title: Drag the button to Richy.
steps.content: Drag the button to Richy. He will thank you and give you a quarter. You should now have a full dollar (100 cents).

steps.title: Click the arrow to exit Mrs.
steps.content: Click the arrow to exit Mrs. Oddverb's room.

steps.title: Go to the lunchroom.
steps.content: Go to the lunchroom. To get there from Mrs. Oddverb's room, click the left arrow twice to go back to the stairs, and then the arrow in front of the stairs to go down. Click the left arrow to go left again and enter the lunchroom.

steps.title: Click Mrs.
steps.content: Click Mrs. Chubb behind the lunch counter.

steps.title: Select I'd like chocolate pudding.
steps.content: Select I'd like chocolate pudding . She will give you the pudding for your dollar.

steps.title: Click the arrow in front of the door.
steps.content: Click the arrow in front of the door. This takes you back to the hallway.

steps.title: Go to Chubb.
steps.content: Go to Chubb. He's the guy that wants pudding in front of the office. To get to him from the lunchroom, click the arrow to go right, and then go up the stairs to find him.

steps.title: Drag the pudding to Chubb.
steps.content: Drag the pudding to Chubb. He will eat the pudding and then start rolling down the stairs. You and Chubb will crash into the auditorium on the first floor. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the office.
steps.content: Go to the office. Now that Chubb is out of the way, click the arrow to exit the auditorium, and then click the arrow to go upstairs.

steps.title: Click the arrow to go into the office.
steps.content: Click the arrow to go into the office. Mrs. Mooses will ask what you need.

steps.title: Select I was sent here to see Mr. Potato..
steps.content: Select I was sent here to see Mr. Potato. . Mrs. Moose will ask why.

steps.title: Select Because I'm awesome.
steps.content: Select Because I'm awesome . You will be admitted to Mr. Potato. You do not need to click the key to get it. You will obtain it automatically. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Click the arrow to exit the office.
steps.content: Click the arrow to exit the office. You will return to the hallway.

steps.title: Go to the exit doors.
steps.content: Go to the exit doors. The exit doors are on the first floor all the way to the left. To get their from the office, click the arrow go down the stairs. Click the left arrow to go left.

steps.title: Click the arrow to the left in front of the doors.
steps.content: Click the arrow to the left in front of the doors. Congratulations! You have escaped and have won the game. After the end scene and credits, the game will tell you how long it took you to complete.
